verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁיר־ <S%H7892><s%> shir- [and] Song חֲנֻכַּ֖ת <S%H2598><s%> cha-nuk-Kat [at] the dedication הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <S%H7311><s%> a-ro-mi-Cha I will extol יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thee O LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for דִלִּיתָ֑נִי <S%H1802><s%> dil-li-Ta-ni; for thou hast lifted me up וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ <S%H8055><s%> sim-Mach-ta to rejoice אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai and hast not made my foes לִֽי׃ Li.

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; my God שִׁוַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> shiv-Va'-ti I cried אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, and וַתִּרְפָּאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7495><s%> vat-tir-pa-'E-ni. unto thee and thou hast healed

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD הֶֽעֱלִ֣יתָ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Li-ta thou hast brought up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol from the grave נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי <S%H2421><s%> chi-yi-Ta-ni, thou hast kept me alive; מִיֹּורְדֵי־ mi-yor-dei- כמִיָּֽרְדִי־ <S%H3381><s%> mi-ya-re-di- go בֽוֹר׃ <S%H3381><s%> Vor. go ק

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dav; O ye saints וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> ve-ho-Du, of his and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> le-Ze-cher at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רֶ֨גַע׀ <S%H7281><s%> Re-ga' [endureth but] a moment בְּאַפּוֹ֮ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Po For his anger חַיִּ֪ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim [is] life בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ <S%H7522><s%> bir-Tzo-No in his favour בָּ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> Ba-'e-rev for a night יָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> ya-Lin may endure בֶּ֗כִי <S%H1065><s%> Be-chi, weeping וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> ve-lab-Bo-ker [cometh] in the morning רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah. but joy

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> Va-'a-ni I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said בְשַׁלְוִ֑י <S%H7959><s%> ve-shal-Vi; And in my prosperity בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest אֶמּ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> em-Mot be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. I shall never

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ <S%H7522><s%> bir-tzon-Cha by thy favour הֶעֱמַ֪דְתָּה <S%H5975><s%> he-'e-Mad-tah to stand לְֽהַרְרִ֫י <S%H2042><s%> le-har-Ri thou hast made my mountain עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz strong הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H5641><s%> his-Tar-ta thou didst hide פָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha, thy face הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti become נִבְהָֽל׃ <S%H926><s%> niv-Hal. [and] I was troubled

אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to thee O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra; I cried וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, the Lord אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <S%H2603><s%> 'et-chan-Nan. I made supplication

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What בֶּ֥צַע <S%H1215><s%> Be-tza' What profit בְּדָמִי֮ <S%H1818><s%> be-da-Mi [is there] in my blood בְּרִדְתִּ֪י <S%H3381><s%> be-rid-Ti when I go down אֶ֫ל־ <S%H413><s%> 'El- about שָׁ֥חַת <S%H7845><s%> Sha-chat corruption הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> ha-yod-Cha praise עָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far; ashes הֲיַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> ha-yag-Gid thee;shall it declare אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> 'a-mit-Te-cha. assured

שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'- Hear יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> ve-chon-Ne-ni and have mercy יְ֝הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh upon me LORD הֱ‍ ֽיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> heyeh- become עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> 'o-Zer be thou my helper לִֽי׃ Li.

הָפַ֣כְתָּ <S%H2015><s%> ha-Fach-ta Thou hast turned מִסְפְּדִי֮ <S%H4553><s%> mis-pe-Di for me my mourning לְמָח֪וֹל <S%H4234><s%> le-ma-Chol into dancing לִ֥י li פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ <S%H6605><s%> pit-Tach-ta thou hast put off שַׂקִּ֑י <S%H8242><s%> sak-Ki; my sackcloth וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי <S%H247><s%> vat-te-'az-ze-Re-ni and girded שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah. me with gladness

לְמַ֤עַן׀ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ <S%H2167><s%> ye-zam-mer-Cha may sing כָ֭בוֹד <S%H3519><s%> Cha-Vod To the end that [my] glory וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִדֹּ֑ם <S%H1826><s%> yid-Dom; praise to thee and not be silent יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, my God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam unto thee for ever אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H3034><s%> o-De-ka. I will give thanks
